Name: chronic laryngitis
Definition: A laryngitis in which symptoms last longer than three weeks. Gastroesophageal reflux
Synonym: partial loss or necrosis of ear ossicles

Name: laryngeal tuberculosis
Definition: A pulmonary tuberculosis causing granulomatous leisons in the larynx resulting from an inflammation caused by mycobacteria leading to hoarseness

Name: acute laryngitis
Definition: A laryngitis which lasts less than a few days.
